Room.Name: Mannish Dignitary's Quarters
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the quarters of Travis, the mannish dignitary from Brownhaven.
Room.LongDescription: Each of the dignitaries have their quarters here so that they can remain in Kista for any duration of time. Guests of the dignitaries must stay at the suites in the Inn. The human quarters are quite lavishly furnished with curtains, a desk and bed. It's also quite a mess.
